name: Surgical Strike Military
description:
This is a especial ops mission of evil enemy’s dig assassination survive that will let you experience by use battle survival guns shooting skills in intense & and plenty of eventful swamp war environment. Fight as hero of super power country so be a super fighter hero of the nation who has to hold aim & target in this ultimate plague silent counter shooters and killer sniper special ops grand shooting mission based free fps shooting game.

Surgical Strike Military Attack furious kill & shoot loaded with modern weapons & advance combat guns like assault m4 , rifles, smg , twin pistols and other killer explosive equipment like grenades & flashbangs to use to super strike and kill ruthless enemies & criminals eliminate them. Be a true incredible shooting super gunner hero in this killer war to terrorist and gangsters and assassinate terrorist enemies hidden around battlefield to bring back peace.

Feature:
Rich combat action and realistic combat experience
Battlefield real environment
High quality sounds effects
Collection of modern and classic weapons
Challenging shooting mission
HD hi definition graphics
